name: gide-coding-agent
description: Inbuilt coding agent for Gide VSCode fork with Railway-hosted agent integration

gide-coding-agent.agentEndpoint.description: The endpoint URL for the Railway-hosted coding agent. Leave empty to use environment variable GIDE_AGENT_ENDPOINT.

gide-coding-agent.requestTimeout.description: Request timeout in milliseconds. Can be overridden with GIDE_REQUEST_TIMEOUT environment variable.

gide-coding-agent.apiKey.description: API key for agent authentication. Strongly recommended to use GIDE_API_KEY environment variable instead for security.

gide-coding-agent.modelProvider.description: Model provider (e.g., 'openai', 'anthropic'). Can be overridden with GIDE_MODEL_PROVIDER environment variable.

gide-coding-agent.modelName.description: Specific model name to use. Can be overridden with GIDE_MODEL_NAME environment variable.

remoteCodingAgents.description: Open the integrated coding agent panel
